Created the Git Workflow guidelines section

Rewrite the Git workflow guidelines in guidelines.tt to include a definition of what is meant by "Git workflow" and outline the specific steps developers should follow to ensure a smooth and effective Git-based development process.
Create a Git commit based on the completed items, following the Git Workflow guidelines.
Create a place to track completed items, such as a new file, a table, or a JSON file.
Once commit is done move the items from to the completed_items.json. Create new fields for date_completed and date_created.
Application started on 2025-03-24
